BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Test for cancelled task in `TransportSnapshotsStatusAction.buildResponse()` (#126740) Testing for cancellation in buildResponse() avoids a lot of unnecessary processing in scenarios with many shards. Closes ES-10981.
